headline: Operation & Information Integrator
summary: Specialties: Operations, Training & Education, Logistics, Planning, Policy Analysis, Strategic Communications, Consulting, Project Management, Change Management, Cross-Cultural Competence, Emergency Medicine, Special Operations, Information Operations, Liaison, Secret, TS/SCI eligable, PMP

positions.description:
Provide management, support and advisory services to several small businesses to include: 

Trio Consulting  http://www.trio-consulting.com 
D'Arcinoff Group  http://www.darcinoff.com
Technology Science Corp  http://www.techscicorp.com
Information Support Agency  http://informationsupportagency.com
Combat Arms Supply  http://combatarmssupply.com 
Mini-Arms  http://mini-arms.com
positions.title: Senior Consultant

positions.description:
Strategic planning. 
Policy development for internal processes, manpower, doctrine, and global support planning. 
Advanced Information Operations Subject Matter Expert
positions.title: Deputy Director Operations

positions.description: Developed plans for integration of Computer Network Operations.
positions.title: Director Cyber Operations

positions.description:
Develop new operational concepts and organization to support initiatives of US Special Operations Command in the ares of: 
Strategic Communications
Psychological Operations 
Deception Operation
Civil-Military Operations
Cross-Cultural Competence
positions.title: Director of Influence Operations

positions.description:
Seven month inter-disciplinary course to prepare Marines to serve as a member of a Special Operations Team deployed to Africa, Asia, South America, or the Mid-East. 

Supervise Instructors & Support Staff
Instructor for Advanced Skills Module: Counterinsurgency & Planning / Culture & Influence.
positions.title: Deputy Director

positions.description:
Advise Commander, Deputy Commander, Intelligence, Operations, & Logistics officers.  
Mange ten US Marine Advisors responsible for training & conducting operations with 580 Iraqi soldiers in Fallujah, Habbinayah & Ramadi.
positions.title: Deputy Advisor Team Leader

positions.description: Led logistics department of 59 personnel in five sections: Motor Transport, Ordnance, Supply, Medical, & Food Services.
positions.title: Director of Logistics Operations

positions.description: Operations Planner, Fire Suppport Coordinator, and Liaison Officer for the Invasion of Afghanistan and the Invasion of Iraq.
positions.title: Deputy Operations Officer
